Log: <nowiki>[[http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2009/08/10/%23ubuntu-meeting.html]]</nowiki>

=== Minutes ===

Voted to adopt the following preliminary General Team structure for ~ubuntu-learning:

# Use LP to track membership in ~ubuntu-learning
# Terms to be renewed annually
# Moderated
# Requirements for General Membership :
** Introduce yourself to the team and give us an idea of your interests, skills, and how you see yourself working with the team, introductions can happen via mailing list or IRC
** Signed Code of Conduct on Launchpad.
 1. Any of the five board members can approve new users following introduction and confirmation that they have signed the CoC

Further roles will be developed as the project matures.

We agreed to move forward with project recruitment, blogging, preliminary course development.
